title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\RawDisk
name: RawDisk
description:
The parameters of the raw disk image.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.RawDisk

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.container_type
params.description: The format used to encode and transmit the block device, which should be TAR. This is just a container and transmission format and not a runtime format. Provided by the client when the disk image is created.

params.name: data.sha1_checksum
params.description: [Deprecated] This field is deprecated. An optional SHA1 checksum of the disk image before unpackaging provided by the client when the disk image is created.

params.name: data.source
params.description: The full Google Cloud Storage URL where the disk image is stored. You must provide either this property or the sourceDisk property but not both.
